SAMRAI::tbox

Memory Support

These classes provide basic memory management support. Capabilities include smart pointers and memory arenas for fast memory allocation and deallocation.

  • SAMRAI::tbox::ArenaManager

  • SAMRAI::tbox::ReferenceCounter
  • SAMRAI::tbox::ScratchArena
